entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
